summary: Bastion is a Great Sword that I\'ve made with the berserker great sword and the vanilla steal great sword in mind of its design.
descriptionHtml:
Bastion the my take on the Berserker Great Sword and the steal Great sword combined to make on sword, this is my first weapon mod so there will be a quirk somewhere, but i have tested the sword and every thing seems fine.

I made this sword with end game in mind, it is crafted the same as a daedric great sword since i feel the materials used to craft it are close to end game.

It is stronger than the the Daedric great sword, and i do intend to make it a little harder to craft later on.
author: Rakonee
